edu.marist.mscs710.persistenceapi.db

Class SQLiteMetricsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.marist.mscs710.persistenceapi.db.SQLiteMetricsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetricsPersistenceService

    public class SQLiteMetricsImpl
extends Object
implements MetricsPersistenceService
    SQLite implementation of MetricsPersistenceService. This class is responsible for instantiating a SQLite database instance and persisting Metric data objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SQLiteMetricsImpl(String dbFilePath, String dbSchemaPath, boolean autoPrune)
      Constructs a new SQLiteMetricsImpl, which will use an existing SQLite db file, or create a new database if one does not exist at "dbFilePath".

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLiteMetricsImpl

        public SQLiteMetricsImpl(String dbFilePath,
                         String dbSchemaPath,
                         boolean autoPrune)
                  throws SQLException,
                         IOException
        Constructs a new SQLiteMetricsImpl, which will use an existing SQLite db file, or create a new database if one does not exist at "dbFilePath". Upon construction, this will also create/update the database schema according to the ".sql" file at "dbSchemaPath".
        Parameters:
        dbFilePath - path of the sqlite database file
        dbSchemaPath - path of the sql database schema file
        autoPrune - if true, the database will prune itself every hour
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException

        Inserts the supplied Metric into the database.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise

      • createSqliteDbUrl

        public static String createSqliteDbUrl(String dbFilePath)
        Creates a connection String for the supplied SQLite database file.
        Parameters:
        dbFilePath - path of the SQLite database file
        Returns:
        SQLite database connection String

      • prune

        public void prune()
        Reduces the database size by combining metrics into snapshots of greater time intervals. Records 12-24 hours old will be combined into one minute snapshots, and any records older than 24 hours will be combined into one hour snapshots.

      • bucketMetrics

        public static <T extends MetricData> List<List<T>> bucketMetrics(long bucketSize,
                                                                 List<T> metrics)
        Groups metrics based on spans of time in milliseconds. All metrics that fall into each time bucket will be grouped together, regardless of the number of instances. The buckets will begin with the minimum timestamp in the list of metrics: [min,min+bucketSize), [min+bucketSize,min+2*bucketSize) ...
        Type Parameters:
        T - MetricData or its subtypes
        Parameters:
        bucketSize - number of milliseconds in each time span
        metrics - list of metrics
        Returns:
        list of lists of metrics, grouped by bucketSize, or null if metrics is null.

      • getMetricsInRange

        public <T extends MetricData> List<T> getMetricsInRange(long earliest,
                                                        long latest,
                                                        Class<T> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: MetricsPersistenceService
        Retrieve metrics from the database within the specified time interval. This
        Specified by:
        getMetricsInRange in interface MetricsPersistenceService
        Type Parameters:
        T - MetricData and its subtypes
        Parameters:
        earliest - epoch milli timestamp of the earliest record, inclusive
        latest - epoch milli timestamp of the latest record, exclusive
        clazz - class corresponding to metricType to hold the returned metric data
        Returns:
        list of metric data of type T

      • createMetric

        public <T extends Metric> T createMetric(ResultSet rs,
                                         Class<T> clazz)
                                  throws SQLException,
                                         com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Creates a Metric object from the current row of the supplied ResultSet. This method does not advance the cursor.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
